channel.title: .class files error! READ!
channel.description:
All my .class files in the source, has stupid letters, everything is messed up!
I have just downloaded creativescape source, and the savedgames (characters) are in this file!
All of these files on my computer has this bug.
HOW DO I FIX IT? MY .CLASS FILES ARE FUCKED UP!

item.title: .class files error! READ!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“MrshHP2010, post:1, topic:374922”]All my .class files in the source, has stupid letters, everything is messed up!

I have just downloaded creativescape source, and the savedgames (characters) are in this file!

All of these files on my computer has this bug.

HOW DO I FIX IT? MY .CLASS FILES ARE FUCKED UP![/quote]
Would it be this hard?
Decompile them, edit what you want, recompile and put it back were it belongs, wallah you just edited it

Read full topic

I said that there are only .class files in the character folder, idiots![/quote]

Ohhhhh. I could help you but now that you want to be a dick you can solve it yourself.

Now do you see what being a troll/Fuck face does too you?

Good luck fixing this yourself retard

You edit the .java files, then compile it to turn into .class ;), your lucky im nice, otherwise youd be getting flamed by members with 200 rep about how stupid this question is.

When someone says open your client class. Open client.java…

DO YOU GET IT???
